freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign drugClinicalStudy>${row["drug_clinical_study"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign variationRefSeq>${row["variation_reference"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign variationFeature>${row["variation_feature"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign variationName>${row["variation_name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign alignment>${row["alignment"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign drugResistanceOfficialGuidance>${row["drug_resistance_official_guidance"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign id>${drugClinicalStudy}_${variationName}_${alignment}</#assign> create custom-table-row drug_resistance_clinical_finding "${id}" custom-table-row drug_resistance_clinical_finding "${id}" set link-target drug_clinical_study "custom-table-row/drug_clinical_study/${drugClinicalStudy}" set link-target variation "reference/${variationRefSeq}/feature-location/${variationFeature}/variation/${variationName}" set link-target alignment "alignment/${alignment}" <#if drugResistanceOfficialGuidance != ""> set link-target drug_resistance_official_guidance "custom-table-row/drug_resistance_official_guidance/${drugResistanceOfficialGuidance}" </#if> exit </#list>
